name: Courage Mission
description:
Courage Mission is a 2-player game, made to resolve disputes between brothers, decide all sort of things between friends, such as: who will go to the store to shop, who will spend more time on the computer, etc.. or just for fun!

It contains:

  • 3 levels
  • a lot of adventures, obstacles and new people to make friends
  • A lot of fun!

Enjoy!
